title: Welcome to 'Blog Git', tech-blog!
content: 'Blog Git' is a friendly space to post all development & coding related information!

title: Creating a user account 101.
content: Be sure to create a user account with a username, email and a password with at least 6-characters.

title: Follow the rules set forth by 'Blog Git'!
content: It is important to follow the rules & code of conduct as outlined by the administrators of 'Blog Git'!

title: Posts can be edited, commented on & deleted.
content: Regular user privileges allow for users to edit & delete their own posts & comments, but they may only comment on other user's posts.

title: Have fun!
content: This tech-blog was created as a space to share knowledge between developers, but it is important to have FUN!!
